title: Intro Biomed Engr Design
description: In small teams students will apply problem-based learning and human centered design to reverse engineer, analyze, and redesign medical devices. Credit will not be awareded for both BMED 2310 and BMED 2300.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (BMED 2210 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BMED 2110 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and BMED 2250 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (PHYS 2211 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or PHYS 2231 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
